articles.title: Asia's Biggest Aero Show Begins In Bengaluru Tomorrow: What To Expect - NDTV
articles.description: Asia's largest aero show - Aero India 2023 - will begin on Monday in Bengaluru with the aim of displaying India's growth in aerospace and defence capabilities. Prime Minister Narendra Modi will open the air show, which runs through Friday.
articles.content: <li>The event, the biggest-ever till date, is likely to witness the participation of 98 countries. The Defence Ministers of 32 countries, Air Chiefs of 29 countries and 73 CEOs of global and Indian O… [+832 chars]
